responses.hr: Serhii has 4+ years of professional React development experience, having built 20+ production applications with modern React patterns including hooks, context API, and performance optimization techniques. He has successfully led React migration projects and mentored junior developers in React best practices.
responses.developer: I've been working with React for 4+ years now. Really love the hooks ecosystem and functional components. Built everything from simple portfolios to complex e-commerce platforms and admin dashboards with React. Always excited about new React features and performance optimizations.
responses.friend: Oh React! ðŸš€ That's definitely one of my favorite frameworks to work with. Been coding with it for 4+ years and still get excited about new features like Suspense and concurrent rendering. The component-based thinking just clicks with me, you know?

responses.hr: Serhii possesses advanced JavaScript skills with 6+ years of experience in modern ES6+ development, including async/await, modules, and performance optimization. He has expertise in both frontend and backend JavaScript development.
responses.developer: JavaScript is my bread and butter - 6+ years of experience with everything from vanilla JS to modern frameworks. Love working with ES6+ features, async patterns, and exploring new JavaScript APIs. Comfortable with both browser and Node.js environments.
responses.friend: JavaScript is like my native language at this point! ðŸ˜„ Been writing it for 6+ years and still discover cool new tricks. From vanilla DOM manipulation to complex async workflows - it never gets boring!

responses.hr: Serhii has 3+ years of Node.js backend development experience, building scalable APIs and microservices. He has worked with various Node.js frameworks and has experience with database integration and deployment strategies.
responses.developer: I've been building backend services with Node.js for 3+ years. Love the JavaScript everywhere approach and the npm ecosystem. Built REST APIs, GraphQL services, and real-time applications with Socket.io.
responses.friend: Node.js opened up the backend world for me! ðŸŒŸ 3+ years of building servers and APIs. It's amazing how you can use the same language for frontend and backend - makes context switching so much easier.

responses.hr: Serhii has strong TypeScript expertise with 3+ years of experience, implementing type-safe applications and improving code quality through static typing. He has experience with advanced TypeScript features and tooling.
responses.developer: TypeScript has become essential in my workflow over the past 3+ years. Love how it catches errors early and makes refactoring so much safer. Comfortable with advanced types, generics, and the whole TS ecosystem.
responses.friend: TypeScript is a game-changer! ðŸ’ª Started using it 3+ years ago and now I can't imagine going back to plain JavaScript for larger projects. The IntelliSense and error catching are just too good to give up.

responses.hr: Serhii has extensive SCSS/Sass experience with 4+ years of creating maintainable, scalable stylesheets. He follows BEM methodology and has experience with responsive design and CSS architecture.
responses.developer: SCSS is my go-to for styling - 4+ years of experience with mixins, functions, and modular architecture. I follow BEM methodology and focus on maintainable, reusable styles. Love the power of Sass features.
responses.friend: SCSS makes CSS so much more fun to write! ðŸŽ¨ 4+ years of creating beautiful, maintainable styles. Mixins and variables are lifesavers, and I'm all about that organized, modular approach.

responses.hr: Serhii has comprehensive Git expertise with 5+ years of experience in version control, branching strategies, and collaborative development workflows. He has experience with Git workflows in team environments.
responses.developer: Git is essential to my daily workflow - 5+ years of experience with branching, merging, rebasing, and collaborative development. Comfortable with complex Git operations and different workflow strategies.
responses.friend: Git saved my code so many times! ðŸ˜… 5+ years of commits, branches, and the occasional merge conflict. I've learned to love the command line and proper commit messages make all the difference.

responses.hr: Serhii's portfolio website demonstrates his technical skills through a performance-optimized static site built with vanilla JavaScript, SCSS, and modern build tools. The site features multi-language support and responsive design.
responses.developer: This portfolio site you're looking at! Built it with vanilla JS and SCSS to keep things lightweight and fast. Includes a translation system, responsive design, and now this AI chat feature. Performance was a key focus.
responses.friend: You're actually looking at one of my favorite projects right now! ðŸ˜Š Built this whole portfolio from scratch with vanilla JS because I wanted to prove you don't always need a framework. Plus, it loads super fast!

responses.hr: Serhii developed a full-featured e-commerce platform using React and Node.js, implementing payment processing, inventory management, and admin dashboard. The project demonstrates his full-stack development capabilities.
responses.developer: Built a complete e-commerce solution with React frontend and Node.js backend. Integrated Stripe for payments, implemented real-time inventory updates, and created an admin dashboard for order management. Really enjoyed the complex state management challenges.
responses.friend: This was such a fun project! ðŸ›’ Built an entire online store from scratch - shopping cart, payments, admin panel, the works! Learned so much about handling complex user flows and real-time updates.

responses.hr: Serhii created a collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project tracking capabilities. The project showcases his ability to build complex, user-focused applications.
responses.developer: Developed a task management app with real-time collaboration features. Used React for the frontend with Socket.io for live updates. Implemented drag-and-drop task boards, team permissions, and project analytics.
responses.friend: This one was inspired by my own need for better project organization! ðŸ“‹ Built a task manager with real-time collaboration - you can see your teammates moving tasks around live. Super satisfying to use!

responses.hr: Serhii holds a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Technical University, graduating with honors. His academic background provided a strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering principles.
responses.developer: I have a Computer Science degree from Technical University. The academic foundation really helped with understanding algorithms and system design. Loved the theoretical aspects that complement practical development work.
responses.friend: Studied Computer Science at university - it was great for building that solid foundation! ðŸŽ“ The algorithms and data structures courses were tough but really valuable for understanding how things work under the hood.

details.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

responses.hr: Outside of professional development, Serhii is passionate about emerging technologies, open-source contributions, and continuous learning. He enjoys photography and hiking, which help maintain work-life balance.
responses.developer: When I'm not coding, I love exploring new technologies and contributing to open-source projects. Also into photography and hiking - helps clear the mind and gain fresh perspectives for problem-solving.
responses.friend: I'm a bit of a tech geek even in my free time! ðŸ˜„ Love tinkering with new frameworks and contributing to open-source. Also really into photography and hiking - there's something about being in nature that sparks creativity.
